tit.j: 日本いけばな芸術協会
tit.e: Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai (Japan Ikebana Association)
Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai (Japan Ikebana Association)
Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai (Japan Ikebana Association)

sen.j: 日本いけばな芸術協会は、華道の振興を目的とする日本の財団法人。
sen.e: Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai is a Japanese judicial foundation intended for the promotion of the art of flower arrangemen.
Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai is a Japanese foundation intended for the promotion of the art of flower arrangement.
sen.cmt: ・judicialは「司法の」というニュアンスが含まれるので、この場合は用いない方がいいと判断しました。・arrangementがミススペルです。
sen.e: Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai is a Japanese foundation intended for the promotion of the art of flower arrangement.

sen.j: 1966年に宣仁親王妃喜久子を総裁名誉総裁・名誉副総裁として設立された。
sen.e: It was established with Princess Kikuko, the wife of Imperial Prince Nobuhito as the Honorary President and Honorary Vice-President in 1966.
It was established with Princess Kikuko, the wife of Imperial Prince Nobuhito as the Honorary President and Honorary Vice-President in 1966.
It was established with Princess Kikuko, the wife of Imperial Prince Nobuhito as the Honorary President and Honorary Vice-President in 1966.

sen.j: 実際の運営をになう初代執行部としては、副会長に池坊専永（池坊）、理事長に勅使河原蒼風（草月流）、副理事長に小原豊雲（小原流）、相談役に山本忠男（池坊）が就任した。
sen.e: To the first executive office responsible for the actual management, nominated were Senei IKENOBO (Ikenobo School) as Vice Chairperson, Sofu TESHIGAHARA (Sogetsuryu) as Administrative Director, Houn OHARA (Ohararyu) as Deputy Administrative Director, and Tadao YAMAMOTO (Ikenobo) as Consultant.

To the first executive office responsible for the actual management, nominated were Senei IKENOBO (Ikenobo School) as Vice Chairperson, Sofu TESHIGAHARA (Sogetsuryu) as Administrative Director, Houn OHARA (Ohararyu) as Deputy Administrative Director, and Tadao YAMAMOTO (Ikenobo) as Consultant.

To the first executive office responsible for the actual management, nominated were Senei IKENOBO (Ikenobo School) as Vice Chairperson, Sofu TESHIGAHARA (Sogetsuryu) as Administrative Director, Houn OHARA (Ohararyu) as Deputy Administrative Director, and Tadao YAMAMOTO (Ikenobo) as Consultant.

sen.j: 加入は流派単位で、流派の代表者の推薦が必要。
sen.e: Joining the association is at the school level, and requires the recommendation of the representative person of the school.
Joining the association is at the school level, and requires the recommendation of the representative person of the school.
Joining the association is at the school level, and requires the recommendation of the representative person of the school.

sen.j: 300を越える華道流派が登録しており、会員数は4,000名以上（東部 2,392名 西部 1,786名／2007年時点）。
sen.e: More than 300 flower arrangement schools are registered and the total number of the members is equal to or more than 4,000 (East 2,392, West 1,786 as of 2007).
More than 300 flower arrangement schools are registered and the total number of the members is more than 4,000 (East 2,392, West 1,786 as of 2007).
sen.cmt: ・equal to orはなくても内容に影響はないため削除しました。
sen.e: More than 300 flower arrangement schools are registered and the total number of the members is more than 4,000 (East 2,392, West 1,786 as of 2007).

sen.j: 日本の東部と西部に分かれており、東部の事務局は東京都千代田区有楽町、西部の事務局は大阪市中央区 (大阪市)高麗橋にある。
sen.e: The association is divided into Japan's East and West, whose offices are located respectively at Yuraku-cho, Chiyoda Ward, Tokyo and at Koraibashi, Chuo Ward, Osaka City.
The association has both eastern and western offices in Japan: the former is at Yuraku-cho, Chiyoda Ward, Tokyo and the latter is at Koraibashi, Chuo Ward, Osaka City.
sen.cmt: ・原文は「東部と西部に分かれており…」とありますが、「東部と西部に事務局があり…」と表現する方が自然なのではと判断し、修正しました。・自然な文かどうか
sen.e: The association has both eastern and western offices in Japan: the former is at Yuraku-cho, Chiyoda Ward, Tokyo and the latter is at Koraibashi, Chuo Ward, Osaka City.
Timeline
Timeline
Timeline

sen.j: - 財団法人日本いけばな芸術協会として発会。
sen.e: Established as Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai (Japan Ikebana Association).
Established as Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai (Japan Ikebana Association).
Established as Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Kyokai (Japan Ikebana Association).

sen.j: 名誉総裁は高松宮妃喜久子。
sen.e: The Honorary President was Princess Kikuko, the wife of Takamatsunomiya.
The Honorary President was Princess Kikuko, the wife of Takamatsunomiya.
The Honorary President was Princess Kikuko, the wife of Takamatsunomiya.

sen.j: 石坂泰三が副総裁に就任（当時経済団体連合会（経団連）会長）。
sen.e: Taizo ISHIZAKA (then the Chairman of Nippon Keidanren [Japan Business Federation]) assumed Vice Presidency.
Taizo ISHIZAKA (then the Chairman of Nippon Keidanren [Japan Business Federation]) assumed Vice Presidency.
Taizo ISHIZAKA (then the Chairman of Nippon Keidanren [Japan Business Federation]) assumed Vice Presidency.

sen.j: 正仁親王妃華子が名誉総裁に就任。
sen.e: Princess Hanako, the wife of Imperial Prince Masahito assumed Honorary Presidency.
Princess Hanako, the wife of Imperial Prince Masahito assumed Honorary Presidency.
Princess Hanako, the wife of Imperial Prince Masahito assumed Honorary Presidency.

sen.j: - トヨタ自動車の豊田章一郎が副総裁に就任（元経団連会長）。
sen.e: Shoichiro TOYODA of TOYOTA MOTOR CORPORATION (formerly Chairman of Keidanren) assumed Vice-Presidency.
Shoichiro TOYODA of TOYOTA MOTOR CORPORATION (former Chairman of Keidanren) assumed Vice-Presidency.
Shoichiro TOYODA of TOYOTA MOTOR CORPORATION (former Chairman of Keidanren) assumed Vice-Presidency.

sen.j: 2007年（平成19年） 遠山敦子が会長に就任（元文部科学大臣）。
sen.e: In 2007 Atsuko TOYAMA (Ex-Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology) assumed Chairperson.
In 2007 Atsuko TOYAMA (former Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology) assumed Chairperson.
In 2007 Atsuko TOYAMA (former Minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology) assumed Chairperson.

Major activities
Major activities

sen.j: 展覧会「日本いけばな芸術展」を主催（2年に1回）
sen.e: Sponsors 'Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Exhibition' (twice a year).
Sponsors 'Nihon Ikebana Geijutsu Exhibition' (twice a year).

sen.j: いけばなの広報・普及促進（海外を含む）
sen.e: Publicity and popularization of ikebana (Including overseas)
Publicity and popularization of ikebana (including overseas)
sen.cmt: ・（）内は文章になっていないので、文頭を小文字にしました。

tit.cmt: officerは「役人」というイメージが強いので修正しました。
